boardgame.name: Il Vecchio
boardgame.description: Il Vecchio is set in the 15th century, when Cosimo de Medici _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; also called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Il Vecchio_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;the Elder) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and his family ruled over Tuscany and its capital Florence. The players represent the heads of Florentine families trying to rise their families to power. To achieve this, they send out their family members to locations in Tuscany to perform various tasks, specifically to recruit followers (knights, assassins, abbots) and collect money as both are needed to take control of provinces in neighboring regions; controlled provinces provide power and a bonus action. Another task is to gain the favor of the squirearchy as these favors are indispensable when it comes to getting an official position in Florence, e.g., a seat on the town council to enhance actions in Tuscany, or a noble rank to gain power at the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To complete these tasks, however, a proper middleman must be present at a location, and as these middlemen travel a lot, they are rarely met. That's why it is so important to have one's family members in the right place at the right time _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; to save on time and money while achieving one's goals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the beginning of the game, each player has four family members in Tuscany. Players take turns performing exactly one action. Before his action, a player may pay money to move one of his own family members to another location. The available actions are to:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take a location-specific action in Tuscany. This requires both a middleman and one of your own standing (active) family members at that location. After the action, this family member is laid down (inactive)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Travel to another region and take over a province, which costs both followers and money._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Travel to Florence where you'll spend scrolls (and possibly money) to claim a city council or nobility tile._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Introduce a new family member to the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Raise all lying family members on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Power of the Medici_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; has faded, as indicated by a diminishing pile of crest tiles. Certain actions require you to remove such a tile, and the game ends when they're all gone. Players then sum their power points _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; earned for gained tiles and majorities in the regions and Florence _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; for a final scoring, and the player with the most power wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Ep 070 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; 3rd Anniversary Special _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Tournament to the Death!!!
Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 339 - Tzolk_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;in, Il Vecchio, Tier auf Tier: Jetzt Geht_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Rund
The Game Pit: Episode 68 - Picking Over the Bones
Wooden Cubes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Iron Soldiers: “Boardgames are lame!” Episode 14

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT2003) In the 15th century, Cosimo de Medici aka _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Il Vecchio_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; ruled over Tuscany and its capital Florence. Players represent the heads of Florentine families trying gain power for their own familiies, by sending out their family members to recruit followers (knights, assassins, abbots) and collect money as both are needed to take control of provinces in neighboring regions. Players also gain the favor of the squirearchy which is indispensable when it comes to getting an official and influential position in Florence. Will your family rise to the top as a result of your cunning plans?
